Text saved: A hula hoop is a toy. It is a big ring. You put it around your body and move it.

Wasfia Nazreen was a small girl. She saw a child from another country. The child was playing with a hula hoop. This was in Wasfia's country, Bangladesh. Wasfia watched. She felt sad. In her country, people thought girls must not play with hula hoops. They must not ride bikes.

Now, Wasfia is a woman. She climbed seven very high mountains. These mountains are like Everest and Kilimanjaro. Not many people in the world did this. She was the first person to hula-hoop on each mountain top. She did this for a reason. She wants to help women and girls. She wants them to do sport. Her country tells them not to do sport.
Feedback received: Grade 3/10 - FAIL
